divs: Sighting DetailsOK THIS IS A LOT OF INFO GEE MY ROOM MATE OUT SIDE WITH DOG IT IS NIGHT HERE IN MICHIGAN I HERE HIM YELLING CRAIG UFO UFO I GO OUT SIDE SEE IT IN THE AIR VERY BRIGHT REDISH BLUE COLLOR NOT GOING VERY FAST BUT BIG, IDE GUESS IT WAS ABOUT 6 TO 10 MILES OUT AT 45 DEGS USE TO FLY. BIG THOE BIG. CHANGED TRAVEL TOOK 3 DIGITAL PICS OF IT. CANT DOWNLOAD IT NOW LOST MY LINE TO PUT INTO COMPUTER SORRY . BUT AS SOON AS I CAN WILL DOWNLOAD IT THANKS CRAIG WOW
